statements: DELETE FROM PurchaseHistory WHERE purchase_quantity > 10 AND product_id = 'd3e8e732-8238-4d3f-8c62-1bb1982dd729';
DELETE FROM PurchaseHistory WHERE purchase_quantity > 10 AND purchase_price < 50;
DELETE FROM products WHERE product_name = 'Sample Product';
DELETE FROM products WHERE product_id = 100 AND quantity > 10;
DELETE FROM purchase_history WHERE purchase_id IN (SELECT purchase_id FROM purchase_history WHERE quantity_purchased > 5);
DELETE FROM product_inventory WHERE product_name = 'Product A';
DELETE FROM purchases WHERE quantity < 5 AND purchase_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM Inventory WHERE product_id = 100 AND supplier_id = 50;
